item.description:
The Spiritual Life: Healing Medicine for the Body, Mind and Heart
a workshop with Mother Clare Watts

Friday, June 13 at 7:30 p.m.

Slowly but surely, science has been discovering that the determinants of our health are not only physical and biological. As a society, we have been opening to alternative and more holistic modalities of healing. This seminar will be given by Mother Clare Watts, a nationally renowned speaker and author, Master Teacher of Christian Mysticism, Certified Professional Midwife, Marriage and Family Therapist with Jungian training, and Co-Director of a global peace-making initiative called The Sophia Peace Center. Mother Clare will likely take you far beyond what you have previously learned about spirituality and its relationship to health. In doing so, she will introduce you to the dynamic possibilities of healing that lie in the realm of the spiritual world.

** refreshments will be served **

Mother Clare Watts is a mystic, ordained priest, Master Teacher of Christian mysticism, and co-director of a mystical Christian Order, a school with 13 Centers of Light in cities across the country. She holds a Master's Degree in Counseling Psychology, with extensive post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, is a Certified Professional Midwife, and has enjoyed successful careers in both fields. She is the mother of four grown children, and currently lives in Dolores, Colorado, where she directs the effort to build the Sophia Peace Center.
item.how_to_find_us: The Center of Light in Jamaica Plain is located just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
